00046 #ifndef ST_GAMESTATE_HEADER
00047 #define ST_GAMESTATE_HEADER
00048 
00049 namespace ST
00050 {
00051         class GameState
00052         {
00053         public:
00054         GameState() : mKeep(false) {}
00055                 virtual ~GameState() {}
00056 
00057                 virtual void enter() = 0;
00058                 virtual void exit() = 0;
00059                 virtual bool update() = 0;
00060 
00061         void keep() { mKeep = true; }
00062         virtual bool noKeep() { return mKeep; }
00063 
00064     protected:
00065         bool mKeep;
00066         };
00067 }
00068 
00069 #endif
